summary: A Reguard woman that is currently residing in Riften and working at the Bee and Barb
descriptionHtml:
Please remember to stop back by and ENDORSE the file if you like her.

Why a Redguard?  Because someone asked me to make another one and I think there is a lack of Redguard followers and there is only so many ways you can do a Nord.

ABOUT HER:  I played around with her options a bit more than others so she has a bit more to help you.  Also, she maybe carrying a few items with her that could help you in a quest and also help you out from the beginning with a few items.  Not gonna say what they are, she won\'t make you rich, but she will provide other help.

SHE IS NON-ESSENTIAL!!!  She will die so you\'ll have to protect her, I gave her some abilities to help protect her but you will have to pay attention.

SHE IS AUTO-LEVEL:  20-120
SCALE:  .96 - I wanted her to be a little shorter than typical.

SKILLS:  
She is a spellsword and has the following skills:
Healing, Fast Healing, Close Wounds
Flames, Firebolt, Fireball, Flame Cloak
Sparks, Lightning Bolt, Thunderbolt, Lightning Cloak
Stoneflesh, Oakflesh, Ebony Flesh
Fear, Calm
Conjure: Flame Atronach, BoundSword, Bound Bow


Versions: For now, this is the only version of her, but if asked I may go back and do a Vanilla hair version.

LOCATION: Riften, Bee and Barb and she does belong to the Bee and Barb faction so she will be doing things around it.

REQUIRED MODs: There is one requirement and that is Apachii Sky Hair
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168 - A deep thanks for Apachii\'s work!!

IN THE PICTURES:  I like to show off some peoples work that they spend tireless hours creating for our enjoyment, so without further commentary here is what your seeing.

ARMOR:  The Art of Magicka by Zonzai and Kalell - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1040
(These two guys have put so much into that mod, that it takes me a while to download it everytime they release a new version.  

JEWELRY: The Art of Magicka by Zonzai and Kalell - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1040
I had to list them twice because she is wearing a necklace designed by them

The Earrings and Circlet are by SidneyB
Ashara Dimonized Dress and Dragon jewelry by SidneyB
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14146

The top of the Ear, the clamps are from HN66s Earrings by humannature66
HN66s Earrings by humannature66
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11130

My hope is these modders keep doing more stuff because their stuff is amazing.

NOTE:
She will stay where you dismiss her. She will not return to Riften, Bee and Barb.


PLEASE: If you enjoy the companion, please be kind enough to endorse the file and maybe post a pic of her in the armor you chose.

THANKS: \"Thank you for all those modders out there for making this game that much more enjoyable.\"

I also thought of something the other day.  Where would we be without Nexus!!  I want to say thank you to the people behind this site, because without them, we wouldn\'t have such a great place to find mods for our games.  Thank you Nexus!!

SPECIAL THANKS: I learned how to do this over the last couple of days from a fellow modder named BravoOskar. He graciously took the time to put up a tutorial, so that some of us could try to do something like this. 

QUESTIONS YOU MIGHT ASK:
Q. I downloaded Jazmin and she doesn\'t look like your pictures.
A. I am using several mods that make characters in game look better. The main ones are:

1. Better Females by BellaGail - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
2. Covereyes by Mr Lenski - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869
3. Coverwomen by Mr Lenski - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869
4. Calientes Female Body Mod by Caliente - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666


IF YOU LIKE THIS COMPANION, MAYBE YOU\'LL LIKE MY OTHER ONES:
Arianna - Arianna - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24145
BreeLynn - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24139
Dometria - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24161
Fayleen - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24174
Rebecca - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24293
Alexandra - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24369
author: Sharky Borror
